post.text:
People in Scotland are not thrilled about Trump coming to their country.

We know the feeling.

comment.author: Nicole
comment.text: Hildog will never be my President she is a POS, who cares what Scotland thinks about Trump, I sure don't. He will put America first!!!!!

replies.author: Jamie
replies.text: Well get ready to move loser

replies.author: Nicole
replies.text: No need, Trump will win! The good people of the UK just voted to take back control of their country, the United States is next.

replies.author: Caitlyn
replies.text: Nicole you're exactly right... looked it what just happened 2 day ago... that should've been a unanimous vote from all Congress... but again stubborn Republicans.. had to spoiled it... you right..

replies.author: Halie
replies.text: Go away. Your lack of education is sickening.
